rules.natural: Provided that the furniture catalog is approved in the northern region, it is not rejected there.
If the furniture catalog is accepted in the northern region, then it must be approved there.
Either the furniture catalog is criticized in the northern region, or, under the condition that it lacks government approval there, it becomes accepted.
Either the furniture catalog is banned in the northern region, or, if it is praised there, then it is not criticized.
Under the condition that the furniture catalog is celebrated in the northern region, it is not banned there.
If the furniture catalog is circulated in the northern region, then it must be published there.
Provided that the furniture catalog is marketed in the northern region, it is circulated there.
Whenever the furniture catalog is endorsed in the northern region, it implies that, if it lacks government approval there, then it is marketed.
Provided that the furniture catalog is destroyed in the northern region, it is not recalled there.
If the furniture catalog is printed in the northern region, then, under the condition that it is distributed there, it must be published.
Either the furniture catalog is reviewed in the northern region, or it is printed there.
Whenever the furniture catalog is available in the northern region, it is sold there.
If the furniture catalog is promoted in the northern region, then it is featured there.
Whenever the furniture catalog is featured in the northern region, it is available there.
If it is not the case that reprinted implies printed for the furniture catalog in the northern region, then it is recalled there.
Provided that it is not true that reprinted leads to printed for the furniture catalog in the northern region, then it is destroyed there.
If it is not the case that either the furniture catalog is restricted or not banned in the northern region, then it is censored there.
Under the condition that it does not hold that no government approval results in advertised for the furniture catalog in the northern region, then it is promoted there.
Provided that the furniture catalog does not have government approval in the northern region, it is rejected there.
If the furniture catalog lacks government approval in the northern region, then it is distributed there.
Provided that the furniture catalog has no government approval in the northern region, it is not advertised there.
